name: Battle Tank
overview: You are a tank gunner and your task is to shoot the enemy tank before it shoots you. However, your mission does not finish there asthere will be other tanks. A scanner is displayed in the bottom right-hand corner of the screen. This shows the position of the enemy tank relative to you. You can then turn to get the tank in view. The next stage is to position the tank in the rectangular viewfinder by fine adjustments of your controls.
